title: Timm Thaler
overview: Timm Thaler is a boy whose laugh can convince everyone. He sells this to the Baron Lived for 66 bets. If Timm Thaler bets in the sixth minute of an hour that has started, what he has bet will happen. In this way he helps his blind friend Akiko to regain new eyesight. When he learns that the devil is behind Baron Lived, he tries to regain his smile with the help of his girlfriend Akiko and his animals friends.
